ovdesc.p: The DE.STP.REPAIR.PARM is to be setup for SWIFT message types that need to be re-routed for processing by the Temenos STeP processing software. This can also be setup for either of inward or outward directions.

desc.p: This field is to specify a valid SWIFT message type.
Specify the Carrier for which the parameter is being set up.
Specify the ID for the record.
Description of this STP Repair Parameter.
This field specifies whether the type of SWIFT message for which this parameter is set up. This can be Incoming swift, Outgoing swifts or both.
